trait.name: Incorporeal Passage (ectoplasmic Entity And Ghostly Entity Only)
trait.text: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. If the spirit ends its turn in such a space, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 Force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Crystal Strike (crystal Entity Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level Piercing damage.

action.name: Ectoplasmic Splash (ectoplasmic Entity Only)
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 30 feet. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level Psychic damage. Hit or Miss: Each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from and including the target has its Speed reduced by 5 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Ephemeral Ray (ghostly Entity Only)
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 120 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level Psychic damage.

reaction.name: Shard Swarm (Crystal Entity Only)
reaction.text: Trigger: The spirit is hit by a melee attack roll. Response: The spirit halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack. The spirit can then teleport to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself.
